full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSKOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS RGYAS ZHES BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA NGO MA LDOG PAR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, , 'ON KYANG GANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
